p: The title compound was prepared from the reaction of compound 15a (0.53 g, 2 mmol) and 4-fluorophenyl isocyanate (0.3 g, 2.2 mmol) according to the general procedure A. Compound 18a was obtained as white amorphous solid product, m.p. 242–4 °C, yield 65%. IRʋ max/cm −1 3402, 3366, 3336, 3280 (NHs), 3058, 3043 (aromatic C–H), 2969, 2895 (aliphatic C–H), 2221 (CN), 1655 (COs), 1601, 1549 (C = C, C = N), 1448, 1321, 1249 (C–N, C–O, C–F). 1H-NMR (DMSO- d 6 , 500 MHz, δ ppm): δ 2.48–2.44 (m, 2H, pyrrolizine C H 2 -2), 3.01 (t, 2H, J = 7.1 Hz, pyrrolizine C H 2 -1), 4.30 (t, 2H, J = 6.8 Hz, pyrrolizine C H 2 -3), 7.08 (t, 1H, J = 6.9 Hz, Ph C H-4), 7.14 (t, 2H, J = 8.2 Hz, F-Ph C H-2 + C H-6), 7.33 (t, 2H, J = 7.1 Hz, Ph C H-3 + C H-5), 7.47 (d, 2H, J = 8.5 Hz, F-Ph C H-3 + C H-5), 7.59 (d, 2H, J = 7.6 Hz, Ph C H-2 + C H-6), 8.55 (s, 1H, pyrrolizine-N HCO), 9.29 (s, 1H, F-Ph-NHCO), 9.84 (s, 1H, Ph-NHCO). 13 C-NMR (DMSO, 125 MHz, δ ppm): δ 24.9 (pyrrolizine CH 2-2), 25.7 (pyrrolizine CH 2-1), 49.7 (pyrrolizine CH 2-3), 84.6 (pyrrolizine C-7), 115.4 (CN), 115.8 (d, J = 22.3 Hz, F-Ph CH-3+ CH-5), 117.8 (pyrrolizine C-5), 120.0 (Ph CH-2 + CH-6), 120.8 (d, J = 7.7 Hz, F-Ph CH-2 + CH-6), 124.2 (Ph CH-4), 129.1 (pyrrolizine C-7a), 129.3 (Ph CH-3 + CH-5), 136.2 (d, J = 2.7 Hz, F-Ph C-1), 139.0 (Ph CH-1), 146.3 (pyrrolizine C-6), 154.2 (NHCONH), 158.0 (d, J = 238.4 Hz, F-Ph C-4), 158.3 (PhNH CO). DEPT C 135 (DMSO, 125 MHz, δ ppm): δ 24.9 (pyrrolizine CH 2-2), 25.7 (pyrrolizine CH 2-1), 49.7 (pyrrolizine CH 2-3), 115.8 (d, J = 22.3 Hz, F-Ph CH-3+ CH-5), 120.0 (Ph CH-2 + CH-6), 120.8 (d, J = 7.7 Hz, F-Ph CH-2 + CH-6), 124.2 (Ph CH-4), 129.3 (Ph CH-3 + CH-5). MS (EI): m/ z (%) 402 ([M-1] +, 2), 377 (4), 376 (17), 375 (50), 374 (17), 340 (4), 316 (32), 315 (22), 314 (100), 267 (2), 187 (4), 156 (2), 79 (5), 77 (4). Anal. Calcd. for C 22H 18FN 5O 2 (403.41): C, 65.50; H, 4.50; N, 17.36. Found: C, 65.83; H, 4.91; N, 17.62.
